thread.title: Meghan Markle 'has met Prince Harry's nephew George and niece Charlotte and is ''totally taken'' by pair'
thread.title_full: Meghan Markle 'has met Prince Harry's nephew George and niece Charlotte and is ''totally taken'' by pair'

author: Steve Robson
title: Meghan Markle 'has met Prince Harry's nephew George and niece Charlotte and is ''totally taken'' by pair'
text:
Meghan Markle 'has met Prince Harry's nephew George and niece Charlotte and is ''totally taken'' by pair' George, three, was said to have been mesmerised by Uncle Harry's American actress girlfriend Share Meghan Markle was said to have enjoyed playing with George and Charlotte (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Prince Harry has reportedly introduced girlfriend Meghan Markle to his nephew George and niece Charlotte - and she's said to be "totally taken" by them. 
Harry and Meghan have been spending increasing amounts of time together in recent months. 
And the prince has reportedly ticked another relationship milestone off the list by introducing Meghan to two of his most important relatives. 
Harry took her to stay with brother Prince William and wife Kate and meet their children, three-year-old George and little sister Charlotte, at the family home at Anmer Hall in Norfolk. Prince Harry (Photo: PA) 
A source told the Daily Star Sunday: "They all had tea and biscuits, and took a walk in the grounds with the dogs. 
"Meghan was totally taken with the children." 
Former soldier Harry, 32, has said in the past he is ready to have children if he meets the right woman. 
So he will have been delighted to see Meghan enjoying playing with George and Charlotte. 
She even offered to babysit for Kate, the reports claim. Prince George (Photo: WENN.com) Princess Charlotte (Photo: WireImage) 
Prince George was said to be particularly enamoured by the American beauty his uncle brought home. 
Normally a chatterbox, George was said to have been unusually quiet in the presence of Suits actress Meghan. 
Harry - fifth in line to the throne - said in 2015: "There come times when you think now is the time to settle down, or now is not, whatever way it is, but I don't think you can force these things, it will happen when it's going to happen. Meghan even offered to babysit for Kate Middleton, according to reports (Photo: WENN) 
"Of course I would love to have kids right now but there's a process that one has to go through. 
"Hopefully I'm doing all right by myself â€“ it would be great to have someone else next to me to share the pressure, but you know, time will come and whatever happens, happens." Like us on Facebook
